remarks: The fourier partial sum for ` F ` rewritten as an integral. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem83.f $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> RR ) $.
fourierdlem83.c $e |- C = ( -u _pi (,) _pi ) $.
fourierdlem83.fl1 $e |- ( ph -> ( F |` C ) e. L^1 ) $.
fourierdlem83.a $e |- A = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( S. C ( ( F ` x ) x. ( cos ` ( n x. x ) ) ) _d x / _pi ) ) $.
fourierdlem83.b $e |- B = ( n e. NN |-> ( S. C ( ( F ` x ) x. ( sin ` ( n x. x ) ) ) _d x / _pi ) ) $.
fourierdlem83.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem83.s $e |- S = ( m e. NN |-> ( ( ( A ` 0 ) / 2 ) + sum_ n e. ( 1 ... m ) ( ( ( A ` n ) x. ( cos ` ( n x. X ) ) ) + ( ( B ` n ) x. ( sin ` ( n x. X ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem83.d $e |- D = ( n e. NN |-> ( s e. RR |-> if ( ( s mod ( 2 x. _pi ) ) = 0 , ( ( ( 2 x. n ) + 1 ) / ( 2 x. _pi ) ) , ( ( sin ` ( ( n + ( 1 / 2 ) ) x. s ) ) / ( ( 2 x. _pi ) x. ( sin ` ( s / 2 ) ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem83.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
fourierdlem83 $p |- ( ph -> ( S ` N ) = S. C ( ( F ` x ) x. ( ( D ` N ) ` ( x - X ) ) ) _d x ) $.
